imdb.title: Log Horizon
imdb.plot: Elder Tale is an online fantasy RPG that has become popular worldwide. But when its twelfth expansion package, "Novasphere Pioneers" is installed, thirty thousand players in Japan are trapped inside. Among them is grad student Shi...

episodes.title: Shiroe of the Northern Lands
episodes.plot: After some financial troubles, Shiroe sets out with an ambitious plan to steal gold from monsters!

episodes.title: Muhomono to Misuri Ruaizu
episodes.plot: To tackle their quest in the Depths of Palm, Shiroe enlists the help of old acquaintances-and even a few enemies-in the city of Susukino.

episodes.title: The Abyssal Shaft
episodes.plot: The team proceeds to the lowest level of The Depths of Palm. Dividing themselves into teams, they battle their way through hordes of monsters to the first raid boss-Vendémiarie of the First Prison.

episodes.title: Shattered Wings
episodes.plot: Princess Rayneshia learns about Christmas with the adventurers of Akiba. Meanwhile, a man in a red coat has come to town ... only, instead of bringing presents, he's a murderous psychopath!

episodes.title: Christmas Eve
episodes.plot: There's a serial killer in town on Christmas Eve, and the adventurers are determined to stop him. But it turns out he's more powerful than anybody anticipated...

episodes.title: A Lost Child at Dawn
episodes.plot: Akatuski is lost in the cold land of death. While her friends wait for her to awaken, the Roderick Society discovers that there are several more things that are changing in the land.

episodes.title: The Maidens of Watermaple
episodes.plot: Akatsuki trains hard but gets no closer to understanding the Teachings. Meanwhile, Rieze and Henrietta are on a mission to defeat deranged killer.

episodes.title: Akihabara Raid
episodes.plot: Desperate to take out the villain before he kills more people in the village, Akatsuki finally unlocks her new skill. But will it get the job done?

episodes.title: The Changing Battlefield
episodes.plot: Flashback to Christmas Eve: the rules have suddenly changed, causing the raid to go catastrophically wrong. Will Shiroe be able to revive after his entire party to gets wiped?

episodes.title: Guild Master
episodes.plot: Flashback to Christmas Eve: the rules have suddenly changed, causing the raid to go catastrophically wrong. Will Shiroe be able to revive after his entire party to gets wiped?

episodes.title: Retry
episodes.plot: Flashback to Christmas Eve: the rules have suddenly changed, causing the raid to go catastrophically wrong. Will Shiroe be able to revive after his entire party to gets wiped-it the beach.

episodes.title: The Gold of the Kunie
episodes.plot: Having reached the deepest point of the Abyssal Shaft, Shiroe tells Kinjo what he intends to do with the river of gold there. Then, with the expedition behind them, Shiroe and Naotsugu return to Akiba where friends await them.

episodes.title: A Sweet Trap
episodes.plot: Having reached the deepest point of the Abyssal Shaft, Shiroe tells Kinjo what he intends to do with the river of gold there. Then, with the expedition behind them, Shiroe and Naotsugu return to Akiba where friends await them.

episodes.title: Kanami, Go East
episodes.plot: A mysterious evil organization has been slaughtering people, and a team of adventurers sets out to stop them, including a frog ninja, a gold-farming bot, and Kanami, an infamous player who's finally come back to the game.

episodes.title: A New Journey
episodes.plot: Several of the lower-level Log Horizon members are itching to go on their own quest: gathering the ingredients to make Magic Bags.

episodes.title: The Midday Vampire
episodes.plot: Several of the lower-level Log Horizon members are itching to go on their own quest.

episodes.title: Odyssey Knights
episodes.plot: As the young adventurers continue their trek to the Redstone Mountains, they join up with a vampire in spectacles who seems to have a lot in common with Shiroe.

episodes.title: When the Concert Ends
episodes.plot: As the young adventurers continue their trek to the Redstone Mountains, they join up with a vampire in spectacles who seems to have a lot in common with Shiroe.

episodes.title: The Red Night
episodes.plot: As the young adventurers continue their trek to the Redstone Mountains, they join up with a vampire in spectacles who seems to have a lot in common with Shiroe.

episodes.title: Birthday Song
episodes.plot: Nyanta encounters Londark, a former fellow of the legendary Tea Party guild-this has now transpired because of Plant Hwyaden whose plan appears to be to bring the world into a war.

episodes.title: The Skylarks Take Flight
episodes.plot: With their journey of Touya and his friends coming to an end -LOE2 Dariella say goodbye to the group. Meanwhile Akiba is haunted by a new threat ...

episodes.title: Stranger
episodes.plot: The strange new monsters called "geniuses" continue to cause trouble in Akiba. Will Roe2's letter to Shiroe shed light on what they are and where their motivations lie?

episodes.title: Isaac and Iselus
episodes.plot: Isaac, tasked with teaching the Knights of Mihama, schools the heir to the throne, Iserus, on the ways of an adventurer. Meanwhile, Roderic tells Shiroe that making a device to converse with the Moon will be tricky.

episodes.title: Sleep of the Eternal Moth
episodes.plot: When the Round Table realize that the likely cause of the current crisis is the antenna, Shiroe is torn ... destroy the antenna to save this world, or leave it intact to return to their own.

episodes.title: Kaitakusha-tachi
episodes.plot: Shiroe and friends continue their raid on the Fortress of Calling Voices, having decided to save both the antenna and their new world. When they finally make their call to the moon, who will be there to answer?

episodes.title: The Apocalypse
episodes.plot: Shiroa finds himself within the MMORPG Elder Tale, and soon realizes that he's not alone. Together with two of his game friends, they set out to look for answers.

episodes.title: The Battle of Loka
episodes.plot: Shiro and his party encounter a group of Pkers - Player Killers. Later, they embark on a rescue mission together.

episodes.title: The Depths of Palm
episodes.plot: In order to avoid a fight with wyverns, Shiro and his party journey through the Depths of Palm, and run into a Nova Expansion Boss Monster.

episodes.title: Escape
episodes.plot: Shiro and his party meet up with Serara and his old friend Nyanta. As they attempt to escape Susukino, Demikas and his gang interfere at the gates.

episodes.title: Return to Akihabara
episodes.plot: After rescuing Serara, the party heads back to Akihabara, learning new quirks about the world around them as they travel.

episodes.title: Resolve
episodes.plot: A strange atmosphere has befallen Akihabara. As lower level players are being farmed for items, Shiro contemplates his next move.

episodes.title: Crescent Moon
episodes.plot: Shiro's Log Horizon, along with the Crescent Moon Guild, open up a food stand, serving up real food to reach their 5 million gold goal.

episodes.title: Villain in Glasses
episodes.plot: Shiro's plan is shaping together. Next step: funding. The three biggest merchant guilds are invited to discuss how to raise money by offering a slice of the Crescent Moon pie.

episodes.title: Round-table Conference
episodes.plot: Shiro has gathered all the major guilds for a round table conference to discuss the state of Akihabara. The Villain in Glasses stays true to his nickname and throws a curveball into the meeting.

episodes.title: Hold It in This Hand
episodes.plot: With the Round Table Conference being a huge success, a probable new enemy appears that no one quite expected.

episodes.title: Invitation from Isutaru
episodes.plot: The Kingdom of Eastal invited Shiro and the Round Table to a dinner. Crescent Moon holds a training camp at the beach.

episodes.title: The Forest of Lagranda
episodes.plot: The Round Table meet with delegates from Eastal and try to feel out their motives. Meanwhile, Minori and her group of young adventurers take on their first dungeon.

episodes.title: Freedom Shield
episodes.plot: Crusty uses Princess Lennessia as a "shield", disguising himself among the People of the Land. Akatsuki and Shiro learn more about the NPC's intents.

episodes.title: World Fraction
episodes.plot: Shiro and Akatsuki meet with Regan of Miral Lake and learn the intricacies of the Elder Tale world. Elsewhere, Minori tries to take charge.

episodes.title: Shock Attack
episodes.plot: Minori helps her group of young adventurers maximize their potential in battle. Elsewhere, Shiroe ponders the consequences of repeated deaths and memory loss.

episodes.title: Return of the Goblin King
episodes.plot: The horde of monsters are a result of a new Goblin King being crowned. Shiro and the others decide what must be done to protect the People of the Land.

episodes.title: The Lazy and Cowardly Princess
episodes.plot: As the Goblin King's troops drawing ever closer to one of the League's cities, the People of the Land representatives discover a startling truth, and try to hide their secret as they negotiate for aide with the Shiroe and the rest of the Adventurers representatives.

episodes.title: Expeditionary Force
episodes.plot: Princess Lennessia, clad in full battle regalia, personally requests aide from the Adventurers in Akihabara. As the goblin menace approaches, Adventurers far and wide prepare for battle.

episodes.title: Chasing That Back
episodes.plot: As Crusty leads the Vanguard into the heart of the goblin horde, a different kind battle rages near Choushi, where Minori and her party desperately fight off a monster swell near the river that threatens to break through and destroy Shiro's strategy.

episodes.title: Contract
episodes.plot: With Rundel in critical condition, Shiro attempts a new type of magic that has the potential to change the world.

episodes.title: The Waltz of Two
episodes.plot: The Adventurers and People of the Land celebrate the impending victory over the Goblin King. Shiro happens upon new information that could have grave consequences.

episodes.title: Swallow and Starling
episodes.plot: The Scale Festival is today and both Minori and Akatsuki want to take Shiro to an all you can eat cake buffet. Things quickly go south for poor Shiro, as he's faced with a situation he isn't strategically ready for!

episodes.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
episodes.plot: Shiroe decides to let his guard down and enjoy the Scale Festival while it lasts. While the celebrations continue, a new enemy emerges to threaten Akihabara.

episodes.title: Chaos
episodes.plot: The People of the Land continue to harass and impede the Adventurers throughout Akihabara. Shiro can't seem to find any rhyme or reason for this attack, and while he ponders a solution, a new enemy makes his move.

episodes.title: The Scale Festival
episodes.plot: A new threat appears from the West as Shiro contains the disturbances form the People of the Land. An alliance between Akihabara and the Western city of Minori is suggested, even as Shiro is getting closer to finding a new powerful magic.
